channel.title: Grindcore
channel.description: Anyone here like Grindcore? I sure do :D favourites atm Suicide Silence Carnifex Job For a Cowboy

HAHA Cattle Decapitation. It’s epic for being Vegetarian Progressive Grindcore!

item.title: Grindcore
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:13, topic:251257”][quote author=SomethingToHide link=topic=331604.msg2621475#msg2621475 date=1231426166]

[quote author=Pwnd link=topic=331604.msg2621328#msg2621328 date=1231399349]

it’s metalcore.
[/quote]It’s Deathcore.

And I happen to like all three of those bands, except Job for a Cowboy’s new shit is… shit. (Genesis).[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2009, 08:22:54 pm[/size][hr]And Johan just likes poorly produced thrash metal l0l

I just downloaded a bunch of new CD’s and stuff from bands I used to listen to months ago,

JFAC’s new CD (haven’t listened to much of it though)
At The Throne Of Judgment’s new CD (Oh. My. God. It’s great.)
Cattle Decapitation’s newest (again only a little bit listened to, it’s alright from what I can tell)
And Mychildren Mybride’s new CD (Know of them? They’re pretty local around here, but recently have been all over)
[/quote]Cattle Decapitation is pretty good, at least on the earlier albums.[/quote]

Yeah I just got their discography also.

Read full topic
